channel.title: Compile problem
channel.description:
when i run compile i get this error
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.Noclass.DefFoundError: Server
can some one please help me fix this

@ruls wrote:

ya i know i did that right away [br][size=1]Posted at: November 29, 2006, 06:57:55 PM[/size][hr]can anyone can help?

item.title: Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @_Tiger ~Tiger~
item.description:
@_Tiger wrote:

[quote=“propabad, post:2, topic:30765”]right click compile then click edit and paste this into it
@echo off
COLOR 08
title TYPE YOUR SERVER NAME HERE Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause[/quote] where it says jre1.5.0_09 at the _09 change it to the versions you have for both. Hope it helped so if you had jre version 5 it and jdk version 6 it would be @echo off COLOR 08 title TYPE YOUR SERVER NAME HERE Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_6\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_05\bin\java.exe" server pause

Read full topic
